text: Hashen Ramanayake (born 18 April 1995) is a Sri Lankan first-class cricketer. He was part of Sri Lanka's squad for the 2014 ICC Under-19 Cricket World Cup. During the 2015 English cricket season, Ramanayake played for Highgate Cricket Club in the Middlesex County Cricket League. He had a prolific season with both bat and ball, helping Highgate achieve promotion to MCCL Division 2.http://www.hamhigh.co.uk/sport/cricket/skipper_targets_points_record_after_highgate_beat_north_london_to_seal_promotion_1_4198684] ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Sri Lankan cricketers Category:Cricketers from Colombo
title: Hashen Ramanayake
